languages.text: "Что?.." {n}Мужчина пытается встать, но оскальзывается и падает обратно на колени.{/n} "Нет, нет. Еще есть надежда. Тацит не мог даться дьяволам так просто, гвардейцы спасут его. Обязательно..." {n} Внезапно взгляд офицера проясняется, и он будто впервые видит, где находится: окровавленное лицо медленно цепенеет от ужаса.{/n} "Храни нас Император..."

traits.locale_text: "Что?.." {n}Мужчина пытается встать, но оскальзывается и падает обратно на колени.{/n} "Нет, нет. Еще есть надежда. Тацит не мог даться дьяволам так просто, гвардейцы спасут его. Обязательно..." {n} Внезапно взгляд офицера проясняется, и он будто впервые видит, где находится: окровавленное лицо медленно цепенеет от ужаса.{/n} "Храни нас Император..."

languages.text: "What?" {n}The man tries to stand up, but he slips and falls back to his knees.{/n} "No, no. There's still hope. Tacitus can't have fallen into the devils' hands just like that — the Guards will save him. They have to..." {n}The officer's gaze suddenly clears and he seems to be aware of where he is — his bloodied face slowly stills in horror.{/n} "Emperor preserve us..."
languages.original_text: "Что?.." {n}Мужчина пытается встать, но оскальзывается и падает обратно на колени.{/n} "Нет, нет. Еще есть надежда. Тацит не мог даться дьяволам так просто, гвардейцы спасут его. Обязательно..." {n} Внезапно взгляд офицера проясняется, и он будто впервые видит, где находится: окровавленное лицо медленно цепенеет от ужаса.{/n} "Храни нас Император..."

They have to..." {n}The officer's gaze suddenly clears and he seems to be aware of where he is — his bloodied face slowly stills in horror.{/n} "Emperor preserve us..."

They have to..." {n}The officer's gaze suddenly clears and he seems to be aware of where he is — his bloodied face slowly stills in horror.{/n} "Emperor preserve us..."

languages.text: 「なんだって？」{n}男は立ち上がろうとするが、足を滑らせて再びひざまずく。{/n}「そ、そんな…まだ希望はあります。タキタスが悪魔たちに引きずり込まれるはずはない…衛兵たちが彼を助けてくれます。絶対に…」{n}士官の目に突然光が宿り、自分がどこにいるのか自覚したようだった。血だらけの顔が静かに恐怖を認識していく。{/n}「皇帝よ、我らをお守りください…」
languages.original_text: "What?" {n}The man tries to stand up, but he slips and falls back to his knees.{/n} "No, no. There's still hope. Tacitus can't have fallen into the devils' hands just like that — the Guards will save him. They have to..." {n}The officer's gaze suddenly clears and he seems to be aware of where he is — his bloodied face slowly stills in horror.{/n} "Emperor preserve us..."

traits.locale_text: 「なんだって？」{n}男は立ち上がろうとするが、足を滑らせて再びひざまずく。{/n}「そ、そんな…まだ希望はあります。タキタスが悪魔たちに引きずり込まれるはずはない…衛兵たちが彼を助けてくれます。絶対に…」{n}士官の目に突然光が宿り、自分がどこにいるのか自覚したようだった――血だらけの顔が静かに恐怖を認識していく。{/n}「皇帝よ、我らをお守りください…」

languages.text: “你说什么？”{n}这个人打算站起来，但他滑了一跤，膝盖撞在地上。{/n}“不，不，还有希望呢。塔西佗不可能就这样落在那群魔鬼手里，帝国卫队的士兵一定会救他的，他们必须救……”{n}他的目光突然清晰起来。他似乎意识到了自己的处境，满是鲜血的脸在恐惧中慢慢僵住了。{/n}“愿帝皇保佑我们……”
languages.original_text: "What?" {n}The man tries to stand up, but he slips and falls back to his knees.{/n} "No, no. There's still hope. Tacitus can't have fallen into the devils' hands just like that — the Guards will save him. They have to..." {n}The officer's gaze suddenly clears and he seems to be aware of where he is — his bloodied face slowly stills in horror.{/n} "Emperor preserve us..."

traits.locale_text: “你说什么？”{n}这个人打算站起来，但他滑了一跤，膝盖撞在地上。{/n}“不，不，还有希望呢。塔西佗不可能就这样落在那群魔鬼手里，帝国卫队的士兵一定会救他的，他们必须救……”{n}他的目光突然清晰起来。他似乎意识到了自己的处境，满是鲜血的脸在恐惧中慢慢僵住了。{/n}“愿帝皇保佑我们……”

languages.text: «¿Cómo?». {n}El hombre intenta levantarse, pero resbala y vuelve a caer de rodillas.{/n} «No, no. Aún hay esperanza. Tacitus no puede haber caído en garras de esos diablos como si nada... Los guardias lo salvarán. Tienen que hacerlo...». {n}La mirada del oficial se aclara y parece darse cuenta de dónde está. Su cara ensangrentada refleja un horror cada vez mayor.{/n} «Que el Emperador nos proteja...».
languages.original_text: "What?" {n}The man tries to stand up, but he slips and falls back to his knees.{/n} "No, no. There's still hope. Tacitus can't have fallen into the devils' hands just like that — the Guards will save him. They have to..." {n}The officer's gaze suddenly clears and he seems to be aware of where he is — his bloodied face slowly stills in horror.{/n} "Emperor preserve us..."

traits.locale_text: «¿Cómo?». {n}El hombre intenta levantarse, pero resbala y vuelve a caer de rodillas.{/n} «No, no. Aún hay esperanza. Tacitus no puede haber caído en garras de esos diablos como si nada... Los guardias lo salvarán. Tienen que hacerlo...». {n}La mirada del oficial se aclara y parece darse cuenta de dónde está. Su cara ensangrentada refleja un horror cada vez mayor.{/n} «Que el Emperador nos proteja...».

languages.text: « Quoi ? » {n}L'homme tente de se relever, mais glisse et retombe à genoux.{/n} « Non, non... Je ne dois pas perdre espoir. Tacitus n'a pas pu tomber entre les griffes des démons, les gardes vont le sauver. Il le faut... » {n}Tout d'un coup, le regard de l'officier redevient lucide et il semble reprendre conscience de son environnement. Son visage ensanglanté se fige en une expression horrifiée.{/n} « Que l'Empereur nous préserve... »
languages.original_text: "What?" {n}The man tries to stand up, but he slips and falls back to his knees.{/n} "No, no. There's still hope. Tacitus can't have fallen into the devils' hands just like that — the Guards will save him. They have to..." {n}The officer's gaze suddenly clears and he seems to be aware of where he is — his bloodied face slowly stills in horror.{/n} "Emperor preserve us..."

traits.locale_text: « Quoi ? » {n}L'homme tente de se relever, mais glisse et retombe à genoux.{/n} « Non, non... Je ne dois pas perdre espoir. Tacitus n'a pas pu tomber entre les griffes des démons, les gardes vont le sauver. Il le faut... » {n}Tout d'un coup, le regard de l'officier redevient lucide et il semble reprendre conscience de son environnement. Son visage ensanglanté se fige en une expression horrifiée.{/n} « Que l'Empereur nous préserve... »

languages.text: "Was?" {n}Der Mann versucht, aufzustehen, rutscht aber aus und fällt wieder auf die Knie.{/n} "Nein, nein. Noch besteht Hoffnung. Tacitus kann den Teufeln nicht einfach so in die Hände gefallen sein – die Wachen werden ihn retten. Sie müssen ..." {n}Plötzlich wird der Blick des Offiziers klar, und er scheint zu erkennen, wo er sich befindet – sein blutiges Gesicht erstarrt langsam vor Furcht.{/n} "Der Imperator bewahre uns ..."
languages.original_text: "What?" {n}The man tries to stand up, but he slips and falls back to his knees.{/n} "No, no. There's still hope. Tacitus can't have fallen into the devils' hands just like that — the Guards will save him. They have to..." {n}The officer's gaze suddenly clears and he seems to be aware of where he is — his bloodied face slowly stills in horror.{/n} "Emperor preserve us..."

traits.locale_text: "Was?" {n}Der Mann versucht, aufzustehen, rutscht aber aus und fällt wieder auf die Knie.{/n} "Nein, nein. Noch besteht Hoffnung. Tacitus kann den Teufeln nicht einfach so in die Hände gefallen sein – die Wachen werden ihn retten. Sie müssen ..." {n}Plötzlich wird der Blick des Offiziers klar, und er scheint zu erkennen, wo er sich befindet – sein blutiges Gesicht erstarrt langsam vor Furcht.{/n} "Der Imperator bewahre uns ..."

languages.text: "Ne?" {n}Adam ayağa kalkmaya çalışıyor ancak kayıp yine dizlerinin üzerine düşüyor.{/n} "Hayır, hayır. Hâlâ umut var. Tacitus öyle kolay kolay şeytanların eline düşmez, muhafızlar onu kurtarır. Kurtarmak zorundalar." {n}Subayın bakışları aniden netleşiyor, nerede olduğunun farkına varmış gibi duruyor. Kanlanmış yüzünü yavaş yavaş dehşet kaplıyor.{/n} "İmparator bizi esirgesin."
languages.original_text: "What?" {n}The man tries to stand up, but he slips and falls back to his knees.{/n} "No, no. There's still hope. Tacitus can't have fallen into the devils' hands just like that — the Guards will save him. They have to..." {n}The officer's gaze suddenly clears and he seems to be aware of where he is — his bloodied face slowly stills in horror.{/n} "Emperor preserve us..."

Tacitus öyle kolay kolay şeytanların eline düşmez, muhafızlar onu kurtarır. Kurtarmak zorundalar." {n}Subayın bakışları aniden netleşiyor ve nerede olduğunun farkına varmış gibi duruyor. Kanlanmış yüzünü yavaş yavaş dehşet kaplıyor.{/n} "İmparator bizi esirgesin."
